Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>Hudson Construction's whole business is
built around <clr:0000>supporting<clr:ffff> our customers as
they <clr:0000>assemble their dream homes<clr:ffff>.
Maybe you're thinking a little basic—like
a kitchen. Or a fully furnished room. Or
something more. We're here for you!
Maybe you want to add a nice space to
display some of your favorite pictures. Or
a place to care for your beloved horse.
But that's nothing compared to what's
really important—and what all of our
customers truly enjoy—which is...
<sp:3:0:2:0800>the opportunity to <clr:0000>assemble<clr:ffff> all these
individual <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff> on their own!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>You pick the rooms you want, and then
you can put them together the way you
always imagined!
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That's the real core of the service
we provide.

We even give a little <clr:0000>commemorative gift<clr:ffff>
to celebrate starting down the path to
dream-home ownership!
You know, our whole family is in your debt
for all your help with Mattison.

If you're interested in a <clr:0000>dream home<clr:ffff>,
I'll set you up with a <clr:0000>discount<clr:ffff>! It's my way
of saying sarqso. You know...<sp:5:0:0>thank you.
Talk_1032: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for clearing the area for me!
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It could be a little tough to spot it in this
weather, but there's a shrine over in that
direction, OK?
<clr:0000>Another member of our staff<clr:ffff> will meet you
on the hill to the left of the shrine.

Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Like I said, your contract includes two
rooms to get you started!

One moment, please.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It could be a little tough to spot the hill to
the left of the shrine in this weather, but
that's where <clr:0000>a staff member<clr:ffff> will meet you.
Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It could be a little tough to spot it due to
the sun, but there's a shrine over in that
direction, OK?
<clr:0000>Another member of our staff<clr:ffff> will meet you
on the hill to the left of the shrine.

Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Working hard, I see! What can I do
for— Hm?

Something is missing. Here, give me just
a moment.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It could be a tough to spot the hill to the
left of the shrine thanks to the sun, but
that's where <clr:0000>a staff member<clr:ffff> will meet you.
Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey! Hello! You must be Link.


I'm Grantéson of Hudson Construction.
Rhondson told me about you.

I'm here to answer all your home-building
questions. In fact, why don't I get started
with an overview of the process?
Talk_1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There we go! Everything should be back
in order now.

Let me know when you're done so I can
perform an inspection.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the plot of land you purchased!


If you place the <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff> we sell here, well...


<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're on your way to building a
one-of-a-kind dream home!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0> It looks like your contract
includes two rooms!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Excellent! <clr:0000>Two rooms<clr:ffff> to get you started.
Good choice!

One moment, please.
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy><sp:0:2:2:7d00>These are the <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>The one on the left is a foyer, and the one
on the right is a bedroom.

They are covered with <clr:0000>nets<clr:ffff> to protect the
interiors, but don't worry—we'll <clr:0000>remove
them once construction is complete<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now all you need to do is place both
rooms on the ground!

Arrange the rooms so that they fit nicely
within the rope boundaries!
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now, let me know when you're done so
I can perform an inspection.

With that, please thoroughly enjoy taking
your first step toward building your
dream home!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Welcome to Hudson Construction.<sp:0:4:0>With Mattison off on her own little
adventure, it looks like I can resume
working on dream homes.
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Working hard, I see! What can I do
for you?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Hudson Construction. Are you
thinking of building a dream home?

Not only is the building process fun but
once your dream home is set up, we'll
commemorate the moment with a <clr:0000>gift<clr:ffff>!
And for you, I'll even throw in a discount
on the price of building the <clr:0000>dream home<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're interested in a dream home,
you can come talk with me anytime.

I look forward to seeing you again.
Until then, sav'orq.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm. It looks like both rooms aren't
placed on the ground...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hudson Construction is your number one
choice in <clr:0000>home-building <clr:ffff>partnerships!

We are here to make your dream of
building the ideal home a reality!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>What's our secret? Why, it is Hudson
Construction's unique room-by-room
building style!
With our revolutionary system, you take
the <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff> that we sell here...

and <clr:0000>assemble them yourself<clr:ffff>!


We hope you'll make Hudson Construction
your partner for all your home-building
wants and needs!
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Phew... I'm sure I'll get used to it eventually, but the
script Hudson wrote for me is a real mouthful...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>One more thing. You can <clr:0000>only place rooms<clr:ffff>
in the roped-off area. Please remove any
other items before the inspection.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You're interested in a dream home?
That's great!

There is a vacant plot in a prime location.
I'm sure you'll like it.

Ordinarily the land alone would cost
you <clr:0000>3,000 rupees<clr:ffff>...

But as a special just for you...<sp:0:4:0>I can offer a land-rooms-combination deal
for only <clr:0000>1,500 rupees<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0> What do you say
to that?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see... Well, I will reserve the land in case
you change your mind in the future.

Please come see me if that happens. Until
then, sav'orq.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We're glad to have you as a customer!
We can get started right away!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>As I mentioned, we already have a prime
plot of land set aside for you.

It's a bit <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here, and it has an
excellent view!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>While it is a bit far away...<sp:5:0:0>there's a shrine
over in that direction, OK?

<clr:0000>Another member of our staff<clr:ffff> will meet you
on the hill to the left of the shrine.

Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. It looks like you have something
here that isn't a room.

As is, this wouldn't pass inspection.
Please remove it and talk to me again.
0003: What a deal! I'll buy it!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I hope you enjoy building your ideal
dream home. Sav'orq.
Talk_1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>First, if I could direct your attention
this way!
Talk_1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0> It looks like your contract
includes two rooms!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Excellent! <clr:0000>Two rooms<clr:ffff> to get you started.
Good choice!

One mo—<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm sorry. I was going to prepare the
rooms for you in this space, but...

Well, there's something there already!


Could you maybe clear the area for
me, first?
Talk_1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey! Hello! I've been waiting for
you, Link!
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're free to remodel your house as
often as you please, so don't be shy!
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I didn't find any problems during the
inspection. You're free to go inside!
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You're telling me that was your first time?
Nice work! Your dream home is complete
at last, so...
<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Congratulations!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll be by your side for as long as it takes
to build the home of your dreams.

Why don't you take a look at the inside of
the rooms you placed?
Talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll call Rhondson over. Please wait here
for just a moment.
Talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sorry for the wait!<sp:5:1:0> How are things going?
Are you happy with your investment?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Were you able to meet with the staff
member on site?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We have prepared a plot of land for you
<clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here with an excellent view.
Talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course, this is only the first step. The
real building process begins now!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A <clr:0000>member of our staff<clr:ffff> is waiting for you
on the hill to the left of the shrine.

Speak with him there for more details.
Talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I hope you continue to explore building
your dream home...

After all, Hudson Construction sells a
variety of room options!

Speak with <clr:0000>Grantéson<clr:ffff> if you want to know
more about them.

This isn't much, but here's a little gift to
celebrate starting your dream home!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh... I can see you're excited, but...<sp:5:0:0>I'm
sorry. You don't seem to have enough
rupees on hand.
Please come again when you have the
<clr:0000>1,500 rupees<clr:ffff>. Sav'orq.
Talk_1030: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I need to give you your two rooms, so...
Talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Come on now! You can't just leave in the
middle of a construction project.

If you want to stop, talk with me and we'll
pause the project.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>I'm a little uneasy though... There's
some kind of massive sand shroud in
Gerudo Desert right now, after all.
But there's nothing I can do about that!
I'll just keep her home safe until
she returns.
And in the meantime, I need to buckle
down and get to work!
Talk_1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Could you please clear away anything that
might be in the way?
